content: designed to be a quick knit for a baby gift the lace pattern is based off of barbara walker s elfin lace stitch the borders could be either a crochet picot edging or a garter edging depending on the preference of the knitting the wool bamboo blend makes the blankie warm and snuggly perfect for naps for you little one of note i did not mark it on the chart in the software program but if you follow the written instructions below between the * and * that is where the repeat lies **note** row 8 should read slip wyib k1 k2tog *yo k5 yo sk2p* yo k5 the beginning of the repeat mark should be before the 1st yo and not the k2tog **note ** row 12 should read slip wyib k3 k2tog *** yo k1 yo ssk k3 k2tog yo k3 **note** to slip the first stitch on rs row only please have yarn in back the pattern will be changed to reflect this for more information and what else tall gal is up to please check out www tallgalknits typepad com
